comments: Hard to understand, have to do lots of outside class study, but really nice professor. Gives partial credit and lectures most of the class. If you put in the work, you will definitely pass. Not hard, just a lot if work, but over all nice class

comments: Ni definitely knows his math but he is hard to understand. Every once in a while he\'ll tell a random (but funny)story about his family or tell a joke completely unrelated to math. His class is not impossible at all but if you want help, go to tutoring.
